comments:
I20030917
- create a new environment
- pull in source files to work on from cvs
    platform-ui
    platform-ui-examples
    platform-ui-tests
- pull in 'External plug-ins and fragments' via import (importing only those 
that are not already in the environment)
- compile (I had turned off autobuild until everything was there)
- fire up another Eclipse (self-hosting or Eclipse within Eclipse)
- create a new java project called abc
- create a new class in abc and call the class FirstClass
- get the following (do I need to pick up some JDT source too?):
